articles.title: Supreme Court declines to revive Bill Cosby prosecution - CNN
articles.description: The Supreme Court left in place Monday an opinion by Pennsylvania's highest court that overturned comedian Bill Cosby's sexual assault conviction, rejecting a bid from Pennsylvania prosecutors to review the decision.
